name: @divergencetech/ethier
description: Golang and Solidity SDK to make Ethereum development ethier

scripts.build: go build -o build/ethier ethier/*.go && go build -o build ./forge-testing/...
scripts.test:go: PATH="$(readlink -f build):${PATH}" go generate ./... && yarn test:light
scripts.test:verbose: PATH="$(readlink -f build):${PATH}" go generate ./... && go test ./... -test.v
scripts.lint: npm run lint:sol && npm run lint:go
scripts.fmt: npm run fmt:sol && npm run fmt:go
